name: Crowned Heads - Las Mareas - Tuberia
additionalNotes:
Crowned Heads is a favorite of the boutique cigar crowd, and it’s no wonder why. Run under the watchful eye of Jon Huber, Crowned Heads has delivered wave after wave of delicious handmade, but now, the tide is coming in. Las Mareas, that is, which is Spanish for the tides. Inspired by the surf culture 
Want to know the secret recipe that makes this premium such a hit? All of the tobaccos were produced by the Garcia family at the famed My Father factory in Nicaragua. Oh yeah, son. It’s about to get real. Medium to full-bodied, Las Mareas uses its Corojo ’99 wrapper to bring cedar, leather, and an awesome sweetness to the table.
